title: Shohei Yokoyama
text:
Shohei Yokoyama (横山 翔平, born August 9, 1993) is a Japanese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who plays as a <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">midfielder</a> or a <a href="Winger%20%28association%20football%29">winger</a>.
Having started his career in <a href="Japan">Japan</a>, Yokoyama moved to <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>, joining fourth-tier NK Međimurec DP, spending a year and a half there, becoming the club's top scorer with 22 goals in the 2017/18 season. In 2018 he moved to <a href="Austria">Austria</a>n third-tier team , but returned in December to <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>, this time to second-tier <a href="NK%20Vara%C5%BEdin%20%282012%29">Varaždin</a>.
Club statistics.
"Updated to 23 February 2016".
